Class RadioButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • Heroes_Villains.SystemUI.UIElement

  • public class RadioButton
extends UIElement
    Class for individual radio button object as part of a RadioButtons cluster

      • RadioButton

        public RadioButton(int x,
                   int y,
                   Game game,
                   java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] images,
                   int width,
                   int height,
                   int buttonNum,
                   RadioButtons buttons)
        RadioButton constructor method
        Parameters:
        x - integer, x position on screen
        y - integer, y position on screen
        game - game object
        images - BufferedImage[] object with assets for radio button
        width - integer, width of radio button
        height - integer, height of radio button
        buttonNum - integer, number of button
        buttons - RadioButtons object to pass back through itself
